Summary: orange lights in the sky hovering
trends: There have been no other sightings in Fruitport charter township
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was inside my house then my little cousin came and got me and brought me inside to where my uncle mom dad and boyfriend seen. It was around 9:45pm and there ware 3 starish orange lights in the sky hovering moving back and forth slightly staying pretty much in the same area. There was spaces between them 2 slightly closer than the other. Than the one that was slightly farther either took off quickly or vanished. Then 5 minutes later I turned my head for a second and the other 2 were gone.
